chapters.title: Chapter 2: The Dark One's Touch
chapters.info: Tervail Dura, p. 121—Dark-haired, bold-nosed Warder with a white, deep scar on his face. He is bonded to Beonin. He was on guard at Logain's door when Nynaeve Healed him. He is very lean, and has a strong nose. He has saved Beonin's life on at least twenty occasions. He is left-handed.
